channel.title: Docs on Bert Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Docs on Bert Documentation

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Getting Started # This page is meant to get you acquinted with Bert Available Features # Bert comes with a wide array of features such as: Booking Time in the Beta Lab Completing Trainings Checking Tool Availability …and much more! For a full list, select the Features tab in the menu. Logging In # When you first open Bert, you will be redirected to a Google Oauth2 Login Page

item.title: FAQ
item.description: FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions # What is Bert? # Bert (or the Beta Lab Resource Tool) is a site devoted to helping Berkeley Carroll teachers and students leverage tools, materials and space available in the Beta Lab. What is the Beta Lab? # The Berkeley Carroll Beta Lab is a 2000 square foot, two-level STEAM lab, providing the space, equipment and expertise for Middle and Upper School teachers and students to meaningfully explore the connections between science, technology, engineering, art and math through complex labs and student-directed projects.
